attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IN VIEW OF THE DRASTIC REDUCTION IN SAVING RATES WE WOULD PETITION THE PRIME MINISTER TO REMOVE OR REDUCE SUBSTANTIALLY THE TAXATION LEVIED ON SAVING ACCOUNTS.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
